vote.title: An ordinance amending Chapter 34, “Personnel Rules” of the City Council Code by amending Sections 34-2, 34-4, 34-5, 34-6, 34-8, 34-9, 34-11, 34-13, 34-18, 34-20, 34-21, 34-22, 34-23, 34-24, 34-24.1, 34-27, 34-28, 34-30, 34-32, 34-35, 34-36, 34-38, and 34-40 34-24 to: (1) provide revised personnel rules; (2) provide amended and new definition; (3) provide a saving clause; (4) provide a severability clause; and (5) provide an effective date - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
vote.description: An ordinance amending Chapter 34, “Personnel Rules” of the City Council Code by amending Sections 34-2, 34-4, 34-5, 34-6, 34-8, 34-9, 34-11, 34-13, 34-18, 34-20, 34-21, 34-22, 34-23, 34-24, 34-24.1, 34-27, 34-28, 34-30, 34-32, 34-35, 34-36, 34-38, and 34-40 34-24 to: (1) provide revised personnel rules; (2) provide amended and new definition; (3) provide a saving clause; (4) provide a severability clause; and (5) provide an effective date - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
